variations.template: Each <mana> in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to <color>.
rts: Each {R} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to red.
Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.
Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.
Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.
Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.
